General.Name: Grand Vision Media Holdings PLC
General.Description: Grand Vision Media Holdings Plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated out-door digital media company in the Peoples Republic of China. The company is involved in the activities, such as advertising on panels and other OOH media; content production, events, and exhibitions; and digital marketing campaigns, including social media. Grand Vision Media Holdings Plc was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Flat D, World Tech Centre, Kwun Tong, Hong Kong

2.Name: Wilson  Lee
2.Title: Managing Director of Ying Interactive Marketing Services Limited
